name: InstallMATLAB
description: Install MATLAB on a Microsoft-hosted agent. Public licensing is not available for transformation products, such as MATLAB Coder and MATLAB Compiler.
author: The MathWorks, Inc.

inputs.name: release
inputs.label: Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: MATLAB release to install. You can specify R2020b or a later release. If you do not specify `release`, the task installs the latest release of MATLAB.

inputs.name: products
inputs.label: Products
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-separated list of products to install. If a product name contains white-space characters, replace them with underscores. For the full list of available products and their names, see https://www.mathworks.com/products.html.
